entry.title: CHP-6 (zebra hand puppet)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Hand Puppets
Price: 5.00

Adorable animal hand puppet makes a perfect gift for teacher, parents and caregivers to role-play with children. Our simple glove puppets in an animal theme make it easy and fun to play, practice vocabulary, play act scenes and spend quality time playing together. 

  • Made with bright colours.
  • Washable 100% cotton fabrics and
  • Built to last

size: 14.25" x 9.5" x 1.75"
care: gentle machine wash and tumble dry.


Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.
